name: Burn
desc: At the end of the turn, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency. Then, reduce its Count by 1.

name: Bleed
desc: When tossing an attack Coin, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency. Then, reduce its Count by 1.

name: Tremor
desc: When attacked by skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect’s Potency. At the end of the turn, reduce the Count by 1.

name: Rupture
desc: When hit by an attack, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency. Then, reduce its Count by 1.

name: Sinking
desc: When hit by an attack, take fixed SP damage by the effect’s Potency. (Units with no Sanity take Gloom damage instead.) Then, reduce its Count by 1.

name: Poise
desc: On hit, gain a Potency-based chance to deal critical damage, reducing the Count by 1 if successful. At the end of the turn, reduce the Count by 1.

name: Charge
desc: Resource used by certain skills for additional effects. Its Count can go up to 20. Count lowers by 1 at the end of each turn.

name: Damage Up
desc: Deal more damage with skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

name: Damage Down
desc: Deal less damage with skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

name: Offense Level Up
desc: Offense level increases based on the effect's Potency for one turn.

name: Offense Level Down
desc: Offense level decreases based on the effect's Potency for one turn.

name: Defense Level Up
desc: Defense Level increases based on the effect's Potency for one turn.

name: Defense Level Down
desc: Defense Level decreases based on the effect's Potency for one turn.

name: Haste
desc: Speed increases by the effect’s Count for one turn.

name: Bind
desc: Speed decreases by the effect’s Count for one turn.

name: Protection
desc: Take less damage from skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

name: Fragile
desc: Take more damage from skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

name: Paralyze
desc: Fix the Power of Coins to 0 for one turn, with one Coin per the effect’s Count.

name: Attack Power Up
desc: Attack skills gain final Power by the effect's Count for one turn.

name: Attack Power Down
desc: Attack skills lose final Power by the effect's Count for one turn.

name: Defense Power Up
desc: Defense skills gain final Power by the effect's Count for one turn.

name: Defense Power Down
desc: Defense skills lose final Power by the effect's Count for one turn.
